snippet: The Chinese government announced on Saturday that it would allow the renminbi to vary more in value against the dollar during each day’s trading.
abstract: Chinese government announces that it will allow the renminbi to vary more in value against the dollar during each day’s trading, but gives no hint that it will accept the Obama administration’s demands to allow the currency to show a longer-term trend of appreciation against the dollar.
lead_paragraph: The Chinese government announced on Saturday that it would allow the renminbi to vary more in value against the dollar during each day’s trading.
